channel.title: Building on Tiny Human House
channel.description: Recent content in Building on Tiny Human House

item.title: Tiny Human House, Tiny Houses, She Sheds
item.description: Somehow I’ve gotten a bit obsessed with the idea of a She Sheds. Or just, having a tiny shed in the garden to escape and read or craft or write in. It’s part of a large effort to simplify things in the house, and make the house as safe as possible for our little one, but also, just symbolic of my need to have something that is mine. All mine.
